qas.question: What kind of groups are on Saint Helena and Ascension Island?
When was Scouting established on Saint Helena?
Who visited the scouts on their return from the tour of Africa in 1937?
What book describes Lord and Lady Baden-Powel's visit?

context: There are <a0_0>scouting and guiding<a0_0/> groups on Saint Helena and Ascension Island. Scouting was established on Saint Helena island in <a1_0>1912<a1_0/>. <a2_0>Lord and Lady Baden-Powell<a2_0/> visited the Scouts on Saint Helena on the return from their 1937 tour of Africa. The visit is described in Lord Baden-Powell's book entitled <a3_0>African Adventures<a3_0/>.
